text: David John Edwards (born 13 January 1974) is a former English professional footballer who played as a midfielder for Walsall. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Walsall F.C. players Category:Stafford Rangers F.C. players Category:People from Bridgnorth Category:English footballers
title: David Edwards (footballer, born 1974)
